alert.note: Alert for Kent; Queen Anne's; Talbot (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 8:02PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Talbot, southwestern Queen Anne`s and southwestern Kent Counties through 845 PM EDT... At 802 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Parole to near Tilghman Island. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Easton, Talbot, Romancoke, St. Michaels, Chester, Overton, Grasonville, Tilghman Island, Stevensville, Copperville, Queenstown and Stevensville South. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
